channel.title: Pages on Gerhard Groenewald
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Gerhard Groenewald

item.title: About me
item.author: gerhard@anjurad.com (Gerhard Groenewald)
item.description: My name is Gerhard Groenewald. I am a management consultant in the UK telecommunications industry, specialising in data science. My résumé provides more detail about my career.

item.title: Resources
item.author: gerhard@anjurad.com (Gerhard Groenewald)
item.description: I have a ‘go-to’ list of quality and up-to-date sources of information that I continuously draw upon either as a reference, for training, detecting patterns and trends, or comparison and evaluation. The list covers Python and R environments, two common programming languages supporting a plethora of libraries used to solve data science problems. I have mapped the list to the data science process, and the skills and knowledge supporting it. I hope that it saves you time and help focus on relevant and critical aspects using quality, vetted information.

item.title: Résumé
item.author: gerhard@anjurad.com (Gerhard Groenewald)
item.description: Introduction This page provides a comprehensive narrative of my career to date. It covers three distinct stages, starting with Education. The next stage is Project and Programme Management, and the last and current is Management Consulting and Data Science. Please click on the following links to jump to a relevant section: Early years & Education covers schooling and early working life in South Africa. Programme Management decribes project and programme management roles at Orange UK and Convergys.
